thread.title: Blake Griffin and Chris Paul Visit a "More Conversational" Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: Blake Griffin and Chris Paul Visit a "More Conversational" Lamar Odom | Complex UK

author: Dana Scott
title: Blake Griffin and Chris Paul Visit a "More Conversational" Lamar Odom
text:
There is more good news regarding Lamar Odom's health condition. After initially being put on life support then coming out of his coma , former Los Angeles Clippers teammates Blake Griffin and Chris Paul went to visit the former NBA Sixth Man of the Year in the Nevada hospital where he is recovering from a drug overdose .
As his condition continues to improve, along with speculation regarding his fate, Griffin mentioned he and CP3 was interacting with Odom.
Blake: "He probably has no idea we were there, but just to be there and to see him, hopefully he knows there’s a lot of guys that love him"
— Rowan Kavner (@RowanKavner) October 17, 2015 Also, Los Angeles-based ESPN Los Angeles reporter Ramona Shelbourne reports him to be "way, way, better" than when he was admitted to the hospital last Tuesday. He is reportedly " more conversational " and is breathing on his own.
Send all complaints, compliments, and tips to sportstips@complex.com .
